text: The 3 arrondissements of the Haute-Vienne department are: # Arrondissement of Bellac, (subprefecture: Bellac) with 57 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 39,204 in 2016. # Arrondissement of Limoges, (prefecture of the Haute-Vienne department: Limoges) with 108 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 297,957 in 2016. # Arrondissement of Rochechouart, (subprefecture: Rochechouart) with 30 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 37,817 in 2016. ==History== In 1800 the arrondissements of Limoges, Bellac, Rochechouart and Saint-Yrieix were established. The arrondissement of Saint-Yrieix was disbanded in 1926.Historique de la Haute- Vienne ==References== Haute-Vienne
title: Arrondissements of the Haute-Vienne department
